Title: Relates to electronic delivery of property/casualty insurance notices
Summary: Relates to electronic delivery of property/casualty insurance notices and posting property/casualty insurance policies on the internet; authorizes electronic delivery of insurance notices with consent and the posting of policies on the internet if certain conditions are met; requires notice in the subject line of an email to be clear and conspicuous and also requires a receiving party to acknowledge receipt through a clickwrap agreement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to electronic delivery of property/casualty insurance notices
